input.sentences: took a trip into the city .
browsed a lot of nice shops .
stopped for drinks out on a nice patio .
found a quiet quaint little restaurant to have dinner in .
it was a great day in the city | which looks even more beautiful at night !
output.sentences: Last week we took a trip to a historical city.
While we were there we stopped in a lot of shops and bought some nice things.
We also stopped in at a cafe and had a nice cold drink on the patio.
We worked up an appitite so we found a quaint restaurant and enjoyed a quiet and relaxing dinner.
We saw as much as we could but one day and night wasn't enough to see it all.
